name: Steak Maker – BBQ grill food and kitchen game
name_original: Steak Maker – BBQ grill food and kitchen game
description:
Welcome to the crazy kitchen cooking game Steak Maker. Enjoy the thrill of the food court in the crazy kitchen and make your yummy and delicious steak dishes with this new and exciting game Steak Maker.

To scramble while cooking something in the kitchen is a common habit of all the girls. But this is an exciting and crazy kitchen game for girls and kids that can make you learn good and healthy recipes of food without any problems.

This crazy kitchen game Steak Maker is an adventure ride for all the kids who love cooking games. So don't scramble, join the food court as soon as possible and download this kitchen game now for free and enjoy!

===Features===

• A kitchen game adventure for kids and girls
• A food court mania fun game
• Healthy recipes for steak making
• Sharing with friends and family on Facebook
• Background and wallpaper personalization
• Cool background music
